name: offtime_symptom
title: Parkinson Off Time Symptom Assessment
description: Assessment of Parkinson Off Time (existence and numeric evaluation); Scoring with MDS-UPDRS

feature.name: periodStart
feature.title: Assessment date or start date of assessment period
feature.description: Assessment date (if periodEnd is not given) or start date of assessment period

feature.name: method
feature.title: Assessment method
feature.description: Code for the assessment method used (e.g. mds-updrs)

feature.name: isSymptomSeen
feature.title: Is Off-Time seen
feature.description: Whether Off-Time is seen during the given period

feature.name: symptomScore
feature.title: Off-Time Assessment Score
feature.description: Off-Time Assessment score (e.g. time spent in off state, MDS-UPDRS Question 4.3; Range: 0-4)
